verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
See my face and know me
From the inside out
Hear my words before I speak
No running, no hiding now

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let my words be few
As I stand in awe of You
Brilliant love in Your body, in Your blood

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Breathe new life within me
Lord, You will sustain
Touch my wounds before they scar
No running, no hiding now

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let my words be few
As I stand in awe of You
Brilliant love in Your body, in Your blood

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let my words be few
As I stand in awe of You
All-consuming love
In Your body, in Your blood

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Every word falls short, Your love so deep
My mind can't comprehend
Countless as the stars - unending grace
Oh help me understand
